About Me

Hi there! My name is Brian Hu and I'm currently a second-year student at McGill University pursuing a BSc. Honours Computer Science with a minor in Statistics.

In my academic work and personal experience, I've learned Python, Java, C++, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I've used frameworks such as Flask and Django, database systems such as MySQL and PostgreSQL, and Git for version control.

Given the opportunity, I participate in hackathons to improve my programming skills and develop cool projects! I also do online tutoring on the fundamentals of computer science, as I believe sharing knowledge is as important as learning itself. When I'm not programming, I go for a run or a swim to destress. I enjoy working out and maintaining a healthy balance between an academic and a social lifestyle!
